ezvcard.util

Class Gobble

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezvcard.util.Gobble

  • public class Gobble
extends Object
    Gets the entire contents of an input stream or a file.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

    • Method Detail

      • asString

        public String asString()
                throws IOException
        Gets the stream contents as a string. If something other than a Reader was passed into this class's constructor, this method decodes the stream data using the system's default character encoding.
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem reading from the stream

      • asString

        public String asString(Charset charset)
                throws IOException
        Gets the stream contents as a string.
        Parameters:
        charset - the character set to decode the stream data with (this parameter is ignored if a Reader was passed into this class's constructor)
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem reading from the stream

      • asByteArray

        public byte[] asByteArray()
                   throws IOException
        Gets the stream contents as a byte array.
        Returns:
        the byte array
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem reading from the stream
        IllegalStateException - if a Reader object was passed into this class's constructor
